accountId.tooltip: Enter your Atlassian account id (can be viewed in the URL on your Atlassian profile page).

accountEmail.tooltip: Enter the account email address to be used for Jira authentication.

apiToken.tooltip: Enter the API Key for your account (managed at https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens).

projectBoardUrl.tooltip: Enter the url for your project board (e.g. https://{atlassian domain}/jira/software/projects/{project name}/boards/{board number}).

projectName.tooltip: Enter the name of the Atlassian Jira Project.

atlassianDomain.tooltip: Enter the Atlassian domain for the API (e.g. '{company}.atlassian.net')

backgroundColor.tooltip: Click the button to select a new color

issueColor.tooltip: Click the button to select a new color
